desc: The superior design and features of the Sentry 300 automatic gate opener makes it impossible to compare cost to similar products. Quality, reliability and no hidden additional costs associated with the Sentry gate opener make the Sentry kits the best value on the market.

layout.text: We don't compete with other DIY gate openers...we replace them.

The superior design and features of the Sentry 300 automatic gate opener makes it impossible to compare cost to similar products. Quality, reliability and no hidden additional costs associated with the Sentry gate opener make the Sentry kits the best value on the market.
